title: Patrick Roy scratched defensemen Brad Stuart and Brandon Gormley
text:
Published By: Denver Post - Today 
Avalanche coach Patrick Roy scratched defensemen Brad Stuart and Brandon Gormley in Thursday night's season opener against the Minnesota Wil...
